channel.title: api on A Potpourri of Data Science & Data Engineering Topics
channel.description: Recent content in api on A Potpourri of Data Science & Data Engineering Topics

item.title: Intro into APIs and how to access public REST APIs with `curl`
item.description: This post will teach you the inution of REST APIs and how you can use them to get interesting datasets for your data projects. First, we will look at the four components of a request. In the second part of this blogpost, we will go through one example and access the coingecko API via curl.
